name: country blues baby blanket
notes:
purchasable pdf pattern: https://www.etsy.com/listing/675823337/crochet-country-blues-baby-blanket

youtube tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_aads5uu6xe

uses moss stitch. ribbed border.

materials
* 2 skeins of caron simply soft yarn in white
* 1 skein of caron simply soft yarn in dark country blue
* 1 skein of caron simply soft yarn in country blue
* 1 skein of caron simply soft yarn in light country blue
* size h hook (5.00mm)
* tapestry needle
* scissors
